text: ab kya vah vyakti jisaka seena (hrday) allaah ne islaam ke lie khol diya, atah vah apane rab kee or se prakaash par hai, (us vyakti ke samaan hoga jo kathor hrday aur allaah kee yaad se gaafil hai)? atah tabaahee hai un logon ke lie jinake di kathor ho chuke hai, allaah kee yaad se khaalee hokar! vahee khulee gumaraahee mein pade hue hai
